comment: I'm literally crying now. Your lectures have taken me through half of my physics semester but now I don't know how I would continue with this course without you. Would you ever post the rest of physics 1 lectures?
Great lectures, could use some more complex examples but amazing for understanding basics.

Thank you for all the help! Lucky that I'm taking this course only 3 months after you posted these videos :) I am looking forward to viewing your videos on Physics 2 when I start that course in the spring.
Im enjoying your physics lecture videos! I was wondering if it is possible to download the powerpoint presentation. Thank you.
Thank u for your time and work! I studied for my final 1st year in mech eng. I don't understand why don't u have more views fr
Thank you for uploading this material, it has helped me so much. Do you have any idea on when you will have the time to get around to uploading more videos?
Thank you for your work! I’ll definitely be using what material you have for Physics 2 to get somewhat familiar with the topic before I get there.
litterrlyyy  hes the best so far
honestly the basic-ness helped me immensely cause all my homework problems are more complex. but more complex problems are welcome too!
